content: That's really helpful, thank you! I've heard of Camerimage before, but I didn't know about the other festivals. I'll definitely check them out. By the way, speaking of film festivals, I'm still on a high from participating in the Sundance Film Festival's online program earlier this year. I watched 5 documentaries and 3 feature films, and attended two online Q&A sessions, one with the director of "The Mole Agent" and another with the cast of "Minari". It was a great experience, and I'm so glad I could be a part of it.
